quote: Children are active constructors of knowledge, who learn through their relationships with people and the world.
author: Edwards, Gandini & Forman

quote: Quality in early childhood education is built on the quality of interactions between adults and children.
author: Siraj-Blatchford & Sylva

quote: What adults do in partnership with children generates a community of learners.
author: Carol Duffy & Margaret Carr

quote: Young children are knowledgeable, strong in identity, and active in culture.
author: Ministry of Education, New Zealand

quote: Children who see their parents and teachers working closely together gain a sense of continuity and of being cared for and experience a trusting and secure environment in which they can learn and grow.
author: Mitchell et al.

quote: The inter‑connectedness of relationships between children, families and educators emerged as a defining feature of high‑quality ECEC; learning is not individual but embedded in community contexts.
author: Phillips et al.

quote: Learning communities are living, evolving organisms; they thrive through dialogue, shared values, and democratic participation.
author: McNaughton & Williams

quote: It takes a whole village to raise a child.
author: UNICEF
